title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: LLM runner that lets you run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. locally via a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; install via pip and chat with local models in a few lines.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or embedders in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compat endpoints).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; stream or block on chat, pull, delete, list models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models, history, syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot chat pane.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store + Streamlit UI.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that answers questions using any Ollama model; slash commands, thread support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-nvidia-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) for Ollama with one-line docker run.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with strongly-typed models and both sync/async APIs.

title: ollama-slackbot
summary: Lightweight Slack bot server that forwards channel messages to a local Ollama model.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama; generate, chat, pull, list, copy, delete models.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing async wrappers for the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Official registry of Modelfile definitions (Llama, Mistral, CodeLlama, Gemma, etc.).

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: End-to-end RAG chatbot template using Ollama, LangChain, Chroma and Gradio UI.

title: ollama-express-bridge
summary: Express.js proxy that adds OpenAI-compatible /v1/chat/completions endpoint to Ollama.
